name: FileList
description: An object of this type is returned by the files property of the HTML input element; this lets you access the list of files selected with the input type="file" element. It's also used for a list of files dropped into web content when using the drag and drop API; see the DataTransfer object for details on this usage.

refs.name: File API
refs.description: The definition of 'FileList' in the 'File API' specification.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'selected files' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
